ppi 0.1.0
  • Reference

create_hrf_afni

create_hrf_afni.Rd

create_hrf_afni

create_hrf_afni(hrf, tr, upsample_factor = NULL)

Arguments

hrf

name of the hemodynamic response function. can be gam, block or spmg1
tr

retrieval time (tr) in seconds
upsample_factor

number of volumes or time points

Examples

hrf <- create_hrf_afni("spmg1", 1.5, 16)
#> 3dDeconvolve -nodata 400 0.09375 -polort -1 -num_stimts 1 -stim_times 1 1D:0 SPMG1 -x1D /var/folders/qs/c3q2tkwj5xb7700v6bg00m480000gn/T//RtmpYfYeH0/fileeae7737c43d -x1D_stop  
head(hrf)
#>            hrf
#> 1 0.000000e+00
#> 2 3.132328e-07
#> 3 9.126454e-06
#> 4 6.310202e-05
#> 5 2.421151e-04
#> 6 6.727547e-04

# visualize
as.data.frame(hrf) %>%
  mutate(vol = row_number()) %>%
  ggplot(., aes(vol, hrf)) +
  geom_line() +
  theme_minimal()
#> Error in ggplot(., aes(vol, hrf)): could not find function "ggplot"
